alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 04 at 10:31AM PST until December 04 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Loup Loup Pass, Springdale-Hunters Road, Chewelah, Metaline, Ione, Twisp, Inchelium, Oroville, Wauconda, Nespelem, Sherman Pass, Kettle Falls, Orin-Rice Road, Colville, Tiger, Conconully, Mazama, Flowery Trail Road, Newport, Republic, Northport, Fruitland, Deer Park, Tonasket, Winthrop, Boulder Creek Road, Bridgeport, Methow, Chesaw Road, Brewster, Metaline Falls, Disautel Pass, Okanogan, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, and Omak. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads and sidewalks will be slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Western Okanogan County
